name: Red.exe
description:
Red.exe is a 3rd person RPG-shooter, inspired by Warframe and Mass Effect.

This project was my third year project for university, for this project, I wanted to give myself more experience with creating animated playable characters (instead of static pawns), more complicated AI as well as different UI uses including minigames.

The main feature of the game besides the shooter mechanics, is the hacking mechanics, players are able to hack electronics around the levels such as explosives, cameras and computers, but more importantly they can hack enemies that they have stunned in combat to allow them to add an ally to their side.

This project was scipted in UE4 by me, most 3D assets and VFX were sourced from the Epic Marketplace

Note: A gamepad is required (preferably an xbox controller)
